CustomField.description: Displays the first day of the month for the expected event date, for use in reporting.
CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Event_Start_Date__c)), DATE(YEAR(Event_Start_Date__c), MONTH(Event_Start_Date__c), 1), DATE( Event_Year__c, CASE( TEXT(Event_Month__c), "January", 1, "February", 2, "March", 3, "April", 4, "May", 5, "June", 6, "July", 7, "August", 8, "September", 9, "October", 10, "November", 11, "December", 12, 1 ), 1 ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Displays the first day of the month for the expected event date, for use in reporting.
CustomField.label: Event Month (Formula)
